DOC.brief_summary: To assess the effect on weight loss and weight maintenance over a period of one year when prescribed with a hypocaloric diet in obese patients with untreated dyslipidemia
DOC.criteria: BMI must be greater than 27 and less than 40 Patients with untreated dyslipidemia Stable weight (variation of less than 5 kg within 3 months prior to screening visit)
